content.raw: The [latest CI build of this branch](https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_common-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/267/console) is very very close to succeeding. It's just running into a linker problem which is almost certainly related to a disagreement about the `/MD` and `/MT` flags between our library and some pre-built library that the CI is using. Unfortunately, I don't know a direct way to identify which library is the culprit, so this may require a little more grinding. Based on my understanding, I think we should strongly prefer using the `/MD` flag over the `/MT` flag, so we'll need to identify which library in the CI is using the `/MT` flag, and replace or rebuild it to use the `/MD` flag.
content.html: The latest CI build of this branch is very very close to succeeding. It's just running into a linker problem which is almost certainly related to a disagreement about the /MD and /MT flags between our library and some pre-built library that the CI is using. Unfortunately, I don't know a direct way to identify which library is the culprit, so this may require a little more grinding. Based on my understanding, I think we should strongly prefer using the /MD flag over the /MT flag, so we'll need to identify which library in the CI is using the /MT flag, and replace or rebuild it to use the /MD flag.
